name: Volts Repair Shop
description:
CONTROLS

  • Left Mouse Button

HOW TO PLAY

Solve each microchip by installing different components to get the correct charge

DISCLAIMER

This game was made as part of the Godot Wild Jam #12 - Game Jam.
